Reviews.Content: Stadia Suites Stadia Suites is located in the new financial center of Mexico City. The hotel is surrounded by other high rises many still being built. Its a long walk away from what's billed as the largest shopping mall in Latin America. But I never made it that far.I would compare the hotel to a Residence Inn. The rooms include a small kitchenette that includes a small washing machine. So it seems to cater more towards longer term stays.I was only in Mexico City for 4 nights so I didn't have a chance to eat at the hotel. They have an on-site, linen table cloth restaurant and a nearby Italian dinner that handles room service for the hotel.The rooms were clean and functional. For me they seemed to lack the warm, welcoming feeling.
Reviews.Author: zhatch
